website_summaries.verdict: A top option in an electronic interactive rattle.
pros: Buyers like the size, sound, and engaging interactive design of this rattle
It also stands out for having 2 volume settings and being well-made
The crinkly ears were reported to be a big hit among babies
cons: may not hold up as well over time as non-electronic rattles

customer_reviews.title: Love the many different sounds and sayings
customer_reviews.text: Super cute toy. My baby (12 weeks) is very into musical toys that have lights and rattles. This toy completed his every interest. It talks, places songs, sounds and rattles. The ears are crinkle paper. It keeps the baby distracted
customer_reviews.author: Marat

customer_reviews.title: Be Very Careful!
customer_reviews.text: The ear on this toy had a hole on the fabric, which was mended together with what appears to be solder. It appears to be some sort of metal soldering on a piece of fabric. The metal came off easily with a small amount of finger pressure. Be very careful because I am fairly confident that this metal is not safe for a baby's consumption. After the metal came off with my fingers, I cut off all other remaining slivers of the metal solder. The ear now has a hole in it, but at least it appears safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think it should be fine if your baby knows how to sit up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew and he loves it. The cheeks light up and he it plays a ton of different melodies. The only downside I would say is it is a bit heavy so when he starts swinging it around I'm scared he can hit himself with it and possibly hurt himself or drop drop it on his face when giving it to him while he's laying down. I think it should be fine if your baby knows how to sit up.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The songs or music to it was simply not bad since I wasn't looking for an over loud device
customer_reviews.text: The rattle just arrived yesterday! I was supper excited until I saw it. My little one is now 6 month the rattle was bulky-er than I thought it was. My 6 month old uses it as a weapon on the first night of having it. Smh. But I figured she'll grow into and the weight because there is a weight to it will help her with her grasping. The songs or music to it was simply not bad since I wasn't looking for an over loud device.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and has a variety of music
customer_reviews.text: Baby rattle is perfect size for travel. You can put it in your baby bag and when you find yourself at the doctors office and baby is getting restless, it definitely comes in handy. The size of the rattle fits in baby/ toddlers hand just perfect. It's not too loud and does have an assortment of music. The ears crinkle which makes my daughter go nuts over it. I'm so very glad I purchased this item and the price is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Cute dog
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my 2 months old baby and he loved it! At first, I thought he wouldn't noticed it because of his age but when you touched the red cheeks and the music starts to sound and the lights turn on he immediately keeps fascinated by this cute dog. Its construction is sturdy, so its durable. Right now, he cannot hold it with his hands but he enjoys it. His eyes are wide open staring at the lights and the talking sound of the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Tfll

customer_reviews.title: Paint came off in baby’s mouth
customer_reviews.text: Paint started coming off instantly and I noticed it by finding black paint on my sons mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this toy
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, so this toy is heaven sent lol. My baby was crying and when I pulled this out, the light from the cheeks distracted her and she started laughing. My daughters 3mos old and she can't hang on to it but she chews on the ears and loves the sound it makes :) so I don't mind that she can't hold on to it just yet. I recommend this toy :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarahi C.

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it, but sounds are annoying for adults
customer_reviews.text: My 6-month-old grandson loves this toy! It has a great variety of sounds, colors and textures (especially the "crunchy" sounding ears) to interest him, and the cheeks light up when it's turned on. However, the songs and things that are said are so very annoying to us adults that we usually leave it turned off. This product would be better if it played simple songs (like Wheels on the Bus or Row Row Row Your Boat) rather than the silly and irritating things it currently says/plays.
customer_reviews.author: yoda

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, hard to hold for Lil hands tho
customer_reviews.text: I love that this toy makes noise when the baby moves it and sings a song. However, with the Lil green and orange rings in the middle, it doesn't leave any room for a small baby hand (my son is 5months) to really hold it. The ears are that crinkly material which my son loves. The rest of the toy is hard plastic, and if ur child is anything like mine, he loves to chew on everything and this toy doesn't satisfy that need for him. I'm happy with it, but thi k we might get more use out of it when's he's a bit older so he can hold it better.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for the car
customer_reviews.text: I love that my son loves this toy. When you are stuck in traffic, and your baby has the wiggles in the back seat, and you obviously can't pullover and get out of car; I can hand him this toy and he is as happy as a clam. This toy is ours of entertainment. I will worn you parents though that as much as my son loves it...it is the most annoying toy ever as a parent. It is loud and the songs and sayings are repetitive, but I would choose an annoying toy any day over a crying bored baby.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Son will play with it for a bit, but not his favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I would say my son likes it, but does not love it. I feel like toys these days have too much stuff on them with colors, noises and so many moving parts. I bought this because we have a wooden maraca that my son loves, but he would chew on it and the paint would come off so I bought this. Toddlers really just love simple toys, this one is not so simple. But he will play with it for a bit here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Kay14

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s smaller than I thought it would be. I probably should have read the measurements but my 5 month old daughter seems to enjoys it. I just wish it was easier for her to hold. There isn’t really a spot for her to hold on to easily. So I have to hold it for her. I hope that maybe when she’s a bit older she will be able to use it a bit (Picture with my daughters hand next to it so you can see what I’m describing)
customer_reviews.author: Miss CC

customer_reviews.title: Hypnotizes babies
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I've been using it on my 9 month old for the last 4 months or so. When we're in the car and he starts getting fussy. It seems to have the trifecta of features babies like... songs, flashing lights, and crinkly material for the ears that is satisfying to touch. This thing saves the day. It has a pretty decent variety of songs and sounds so you won't be as sick of it as some other musical toys. VERY useful ace up the sleeve
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Non-functioning item received
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as holiday gift however not able to deliver gift until this week. Unit did not work. Assumed unit left on by someone so purchased new batteries. Installed new batteries today and unit still doesn't operate. Very disappointed in the quality of the item.
customer_reviews.author: JP Frye

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Best distraction for when he is screaming in his carseat or out in public, even at home. Hurts when you give them control of it to hold and they accidentally bop themselves in the face with it
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Great BUT one huge flaw...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product that my twin babies (three months old) love. However, there is one huge problem. A plastic piece from the back keeps coming off loose. I just ended up taking it off because I was terrified. This can be a choking hazard. Please be mindful.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Not amazing, but good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty good. I was hoping it'd be made of softer or plush material, the plastic seems too hard for my little guy and I'm worried he could hurt his face or mouth on it. The songs are short. I like how sensitive it is. If he wants it to sing he can shake it a little and get the sounds and it sings. It's not an amazing toy, but it's good for the price
customer_reviews.author: David Kligmann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tummy time focal point!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that was easy to keep making sounds and lights for tummy time. This will play songs by pushing the button but will also play shorter songs, sounds and sayings just by shaking it. We've been working to get baby to stretch his neck and turn both ways and he will follow this toy on his tummy and back. A variety of little songs and sounds. It's great that it has ability to be a rattle as well. The ears are crinkly which is great because that's the only thing he can grab onto the toy by right now. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely passed the baby-user test.
customer_reviews.text: My 3 1/2 month old great grandson was fascinated and responded like he loved this baby rattle. It held his attention while the puppy's cheeks flashed red lights, music played, and he enjoyed the crunching sound as he held onto the ears. He kept nudging it once he discovered the toy responded with music and lights. Several other parts of the toy will be discovered as his dexterity improves. So far I am very pleased with the high quality, multiple functions and reasonable prices of VTech toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Good Buy. My son loved this thing. Very cheap and he plays with this little toy quite often. It’s is pretty small. I thought it may have been bigger but it is small but no to small for an infant. My son was 5 months when I got this. Loves the noises that it makes and it is not to noisy to listen to it over and over from a parents perspective. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Shakiesha

customer_reviews.title: (which is all my teething baby wants to do) & if he gets to shaking it he usually ends up bonking himself in the head with it & it's pretty clunky lol Also
customer_reviews.text: This toy keeps my 5 month old interested enough I guess. My son likes to crinkle the ears, but he doesn't seem to care for anything else about it. There isn't really any part of it to chew on, (which is all my teething baby wants to do) & if he gets to shaking it he usually ends up bonking himself in the head with it & it's pretty clunky lol Also, It has an off switch and a low & high volume setting.
customer_reviews.author: LizzySuns

customer_reviews.title: Music did not work.
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked this but the music did not work. I put new batteries in and even had a family member try. It's not worth sending back at this time. I bought a few toys for my grandson and this is the second one that did not work. Maybe check to see if it works before sending it out. It was a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: His favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson is 5 months and loves this toy! A BIG plus is that it has an off button! It lights up, makes funny noises, barks, sings songs. He loves the crinkle ears. Till he throws it on the floor, ha ha! My kids, now in their 20s had Vtech toys, and this one is just as good. Fits in his diaper bag. Easy for his little hands and his mouth. Wpie clean when he spits up. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa1106

customer_reviews.title: Like most baby toys
customer_reviews.text: It's quite stimulating with kind of crazy lights flashing and fast paced tunes. Like most baby toys, its is VERY loud and only has a single volume setting. The speaker area is not smooth so it was harder to muffle using my standard "tape-over-the-speaker" technique. Otherwise, baby seemed to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Spiderpig

customer_reviews.title: Perfect textures for an infant and captures attention all day!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 month old son has been playing with this rattle since he was 6 months old. He loves the crinkly ears, the music it plays, and the toys on the rattle part. Although he loves this rattle, I wish there was an option for 2 different sound settings. The music and sound on it is very loud, too loud at times. If they redesigned this with 2 sound options, that would be amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Basden

customer_reviews.title: Loooove this little blue
customer_reviews.text: Grandbaby loves this! I have now purchased 2 of these as my granddaughter loves this little blue She could be fussy and crying, we bring out little blue and her face immediately lights up and mood changes. Both purchases were fast, smooth and great service I recommend this 100%
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: grandson's fav toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson absolutely loves this blue puppy. Unfortunately after a month, it stopped working. It will be mailed back tomorrow. I like Vtech toys and decided to order a different Vtech to replace the blue puppy. He's only six months and loved chewing on the ears. We'll see how the new replacement toy is accepted???
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Decent little baby rattle
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our baby. It's nice but I wish it was a little softer. It's a pretty hard plastic and I thought there were going to be different parts that would be a firmer texture. At six months, I think it's a little harder to hold at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy B

customer_reviews.title: harmful!
customer_reviews.text: My baby's arm was pinched between two of the loose attachments. I'm very upset!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Durable Toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy! He smacks it, chews it, flings it all over the house and it holds up. He really likes the music and the light up cheeks. I would definitely buy this as a gift for someone else. So far there doesn’t seem to be a downside.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy, but not a Prime Item
customer_reviews.text: The toy is super cute. The music is loud and will def catch any baby's attention. The cheeks light up and the ears crinkle. Great baby toy. However, buyer beware. It is marked as a Prime item for $7.99...however...it is not. ((It is actually $15.17 at checkout.)) :/
customer_reviews.author: LakFam

customer_reviews.title: He didn't like it for awhile
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son at 2 or 3 months, can't remember. He didn't like it for awhile, it was a little heavy for him at first. He started to love it around 5 months and now at almost 7 months, goes nuts over it.
customer_reviews.author: myranda

customer_reviews.title: i suggest for older infants 7+months
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this rattle. It is a bit heavy, so I would suggest only to infants tbat can sit and have a strong grip because it is hard and it is heavy; so if it hits the face or falls onto face it will hurt. My baby was 7 months old and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Cacciatori

customer_reviews.title: Nice but also dangerous
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this but it can be dangerous for the age group that it is designed for. The puppy face is quite hard and the ears are just fabric. But my daughter laughs when he makes his noises and loves to shake it up.
customer_reviews.author: jeaninelk868

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: The dogs ears are made with that crinkle stuff and can be chewed on. It lights up and is kinda loud, but you can turn it off. It has some basic rattles on it too. It's a bit heavy, but still pretty easy for a baby to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Money wasted.
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy, but I gave this to our son on Christmas day and realized a few days later it only works when it wants to. Unfortunately I shop for holiday gifts early and it's too late to return it. I'm extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: We love this puppy! The songs are really cute and my little one just adores it, immediately smiles each time she sees it. She’s 3 months old and doesn’t have any issues holding it OT putting the ears in her mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excites a 5 month old
customer_reviews.text: Great entertainment for a 5 month old. Easy to hold and lots of ways for them to hold it. Most difficult for the adult difficult to use it to realize that there is a tiny on/off switch on the dogs head (DUH!)
customer_reviews.author: MDMom

customer_reviews.title: Fun interactive play for my 6 month old Grandson! Wyatt approved!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love This Puppy! 6 month old approved. Easy to hold and easy to make the sounds activate. The ears crinkle and make the perfect chewing piece. This sparks joy!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Does the job of soothing the baby
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that my 4 month old can't really hold this with one hand, and it kind of defeats the purpose. But other than that it's good, sounds, lights, sensitivity to movement, all good and it soothes my baby fast.
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: Will last forever and entertain for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Gave to my great granddaughter when she was probably 6 months and she still loves it when she comes to my house and she is 16 months now. It is very well designed and looks brand new so it is highly recommended as a long lasting toy .
customer_reviews.author: Rita Falls

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift
customer_reviews.text: I really like this you and my daughter liked it too but at 9 months old she only played with it long enough for me to change her diaper then she was done with it😆I may have liked it more.
customer_reviews.author: Johane

customer_reviews.title: Could be harmful to baby.
customer_reviews.text: So, guess I had the wrong idea about this toy. The electronics functions are fun, but the item is heavy and very hard. Baby cannot play with it hands on. Baby could definitely hurt themselves.
customer_reviews.author: mamunro

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Nice toy for the price, a little heavy for a tiny baby but in no time my grandson was accidentally pushing the button and gnawing on the soft little ears. He loves it when he’s confined in his car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Christa wright

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I debated getting this toy for my 6 month old, but it’s her favorite!! The crinkly ears, bark, lights, etc keep her attention. Definitely A good buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Motherof5

customer_reviews.title: Best $8 I’ve ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old LOVES this! Hysterical tears to laughing & smiling the minute she sees it. It’s great bc it keeps talking to her even if she isn’t pressing buttons, & she’s dropped it from her bum o seat on the counter to the tile floor, & even in the mud this morning, & it just keeps going strong. We love “Puppy!”
customer_reviews.author: MilliesMama

customer_reviews.title: I think it even annoys the baby
customer_reviews.text: Baby likes it for a few minutes then cries. It literally doesn’t stop making noise. He likes the crinkly ears and rattle when the volume it turned off though
customer_reviews.author: MobileReader

customer_reviews.title: Great rattle and songs
customer_reviews.text: Our 7 month old loves this rattle so much. The songs aren't annoying and it's pretty durable, especially for an infant that likes to hit with things. It's great for teething as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Lots of stimulating exercises in a small toy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect size and visually appealing to our 10-month old son. Plenty of activities...crunchy ears among them to keep babies entertained in a compact toy. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: David LaVigne

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hard to grip for tiny hands
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute. The songs are loud and hold my daughter's attention. Well worth the price. There is a design flaw in the fact that babies have to hold it with both hands. My daughter likes it but doesn't play with it for long because she likes to have 1 hand free to grab other things. It's durable too...she drops it often.
customer_reviews.author: McTighes

customer_reviews.title: Makes car rides so much easier
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this thing! We got it for Her when she was about 3/4 months. We started out holding it for her and now she carries it around at age 1. (I dropped it in a bucket of water and she still played with it without sound) I ordered a second one and now she’s enjoying it to its full extent.!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: The flashing lights and music really catch the babies attention!
customer_reviews.text: The nonstop music and lights make my grandson smile, and he gets very excited. It's a little heavy for him to hold at 4 months. The only thing soft are the ears, which he chews on a little. What matters most is he likes it and is entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: 7 month old daughters favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 7mo old daughter has absolutely loved this thing from day one. No issues and the toy is still one of her favorites. The on/off switch is a life saver, some of the other noise making toys don’t have off switches :/ Daughter didn’t always know there was a button to activate the lights/sound but it appears to be “movement” activated so it still works incredibly good even without hitting the button.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Terry

customer_reviews.title: Eh maybe when she’s 6m+
customer_reviews.text: The age on this is 3m+ ... there’s no way my 3.5 month old can hold this . There’s really not easy way for her to, it’s thicken and too much stuff on the handle and it’s pretty heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stimulating toy for a great value!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute rattle, it’s one of my sons favorite! I think that it’s tough to hold for my little one that is three months however when he’s older I’m sure it will be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine K

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy seems durable. My daughter is only 3 months so its not getting much use yet. She loves watching his cheeks light up and listens to him talk. Its a cute toy .
customer_reviews.author: Roseanna

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: She was almost 2 months when I first purchased this and I actually just bought it to get free shipping lol now she’s three months and LOVES it, lots of sayings/songs and it lights up. She cracks up evey time we start playing with it! Nice quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Dana M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew and he LOVES IT! He loves rattles in general but especially this one because of all the added stuff to it. This is one of his favorite toys! Dedinetely would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra H

customer_reviews.title: Loud but engaging and easy to hold
customer_reviews.text: Very entertaining and engaging toy. My 6 month old is starting to grab it and shake it. It's very sensitive to motion. If he doesn't play with it for a while, it goes into sleep mode and will only turn back on if a button is pushed. The only reasons I'm knocking off a star is that there is no volume control. Also, it sounds a lot like a casino slot machine! Finally, you WILL hear, "I have two red rosey cheeks, two colorful ears and a cute little nose," in your sleep.
customer_reviews.author: I code dead people

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: This was my sons favorite toy from about months 3-8. Pretty much from the time he could hold it he loved it. We have purchased it 2 other times to give to our friends at baby showers.
customer_reviews.author: Levi Hitt

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Great Toy my son loves it. I thought it sang the alphabet but it doesn’t however it sings some kids’ songs. I’m sure my son will be playing with this toy for months. It’s already been a while and I haven’t had to replace the original batteries
customer_reviews.author: Marquita

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter’s Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has a zillion toys and this one is definitely her favorite! She’s seven months old now but has gravitated to this one for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Sue

customer_reviews.title: Our baby LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: Initially, my little girl (4 months old) wasn't sure what to do with this toy. I thought it was a little too loud; however, it is one of her favorites now and has kept her interest the longest! I received the product when and as expected. It has functioned properly for a month, so far - I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B Has

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy. You can easily toss it in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. You can easily toss it in the diaper bag for entertainment at a restaurant, etc. I purchased it to use for my son's physical therapy. He will gladly look at it light up and listen to it sing while we do his stretches. I've already purchased it as a gift for an expecting mom!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: A bit heavy for my 3 month old but great!
customer_reviews.text: It's great! I love the colors and textures and sounds. My baby kicks it sometimes and it gives off different sounds, which she loves. My three-month-old doesn't grab it and it's a big heavy for her even if I hand it to her. I think she does chew on the ears- those are soft.
customer_reviews.author: BroadwayComposer

customer_reviews.title: I feel guilty at how much we all like this. It's like giving the kid a tiny ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel guilty at how much we all like this. It's like giving the kid a tiny TV--lights and sounds to calm her down! But she really likes it and we are using it to lead her to practice rolling over. Amazon really has a good selection of high quality baby toys for low prices. And I was not paid for saying that.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred E. Guy Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, he’s 4 months old. Too heavy and bulky for him to hold it but when I bring it out and turn it on he smiles!
customer_reviews.author: Scotch

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love vtech products. This one in my opinion needs to be lighter and not be painted. The toy is heavy and some paint was chipped when I got it. I thought about sending it back but I can give it to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Time will show.
customer_reviews.text: My little one didn't try it yet. This toy is pretty heavy for little hands. Will try it later. But sounds good. Toy make it factions. After all I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia D

customer_reviews.title: Good for entertaining baby, but loud and heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty neat product, but it could definitely use a volume button! My 2 month old seemed terrified by it at first because it’s so incredibly LOUD! I put some tape over the speaker to make it not so loud and she seems to like it more now. It’s also very heavy, so I would be afraid that once she learns to hold things that it would really hurt if she accidentally bopped herself in the head with it or something. Other than those couple things, it’s great for what I bought it for and seems to hold her attention really well with the lights and sounds!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Booe

customer_reviews.title: Six month old approved
customer_reviews.text: My six month old loves this. Easy to grip, lights up, and makes a few different sounds. He also thinks the ears make a delicious teething toy.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for busy babies
customer_reviews.text: Perfect toy for my 3 month old baby. He is a busy boy and this toy is perfect for entertaining him. He loves the lights, sounds and textures. The product was also shipped in a timely manner and packaging was clean and durable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rian R.

customer_reviews.title: Great activity past time toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of baby's favs. She loves the lights, music which she rocks to and her little hands can grasp with no trouble. She likes the ears too!
customer_reviews.author: deb a.

customer_reviews.title: Baby's favorite
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my four-month-old for Christmas last year. I was at a bit of a loss of what to get him besides clothes. This has turned out to be one of his favorite toys. It lights up, the ears crinkle, and it makes noise when you shake it. I don't think I've bought a Vtech toy that my kids haven't loved.
customer_reviews.author: A Loughridge

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: It's an all in one. Love this rattle because it has music, pieces to play with, and the ears act as a teether.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Surprise she loves it
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was too plain for my daughter but she loves it. She gets so excited when she hears it. It plays a few repetitive songs even when the button isnt being pushed, which entertains her. The center button activates a couple of longer melodies.
customer_reviews.author: denys Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a life saver. My husbands god-daughter absolutely loves playing with the crunchy ears and of course, listening to the songs it plays. It soothes her when she gets upset. I purchased one for my baby who is due this year.
customer_reviews.author: kailyn

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves This!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our 10 months old favorite toys! We keep it in the car so he has something to play with and it keeps him entertained. Love the crinkly ears and the cute songs.
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy and my daughter too
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy and my daughter too. Many songs, many sounds. Light weight and the fact that it has a 10 seconds time out with no use, meand battery will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: AngelTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy! The color is great, the music is great, and it is interactive.
customer_reviews.author: hokie fan

customer_reviews.title: Underwhelming, may work better for young babies
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toy for my 7 month old as a new toy to entertain him in his first flight. There's not much to the toy beside the light up cheeks, crinkle paper ears, and a faint rattling noise from rattle. It's a bit underwhelming. It fits well in babg's hands. I wished it has some cooler features or if the rattle was louder.
customer_reviews.author: Ailia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old son has had this toy for about a month now. We bought it based on a recommendation from a family member that also used it with her son a couple of years ago. This holds my son’s attention like nothing else and he smiles/giggles at it constantly. We even use it to help with his physical therapy on his neck because he will follow it any direction you move it. He also loves trying to grab the crinkle fabric on the ears.

customer_reviews.title: Great baby you!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my new born Granddaughter...she is now 5mo. And this is one of her favorite toys....great quality!

customer_reviews.text: This is small enough for little hands to hold. It is colorful and rattles to entertain the baby. It is adorable with the puppy on it

customer_reviews.title: Rattle
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gifts I have bought for my grandson, he loves it and plays with it every day, it also perfect on car rides to keep little ones entertained

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Great!
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 mos old grandson loves this! I like that it keeps playing while there's movement. Great for stroller rides. Keeps him occupied even when we're not taking a walk. Batteries seem to last a while too.

customer_reviews.title: A happy camper.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson 4 months old Grayson loved his new toy. He can not put it down. A friend of my daughters said she was going to purchase one too after she saw his.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Watkins

customer_reviews.title: This toy is not intended for a 3 month old ...
customer_reviews.text: This toy is not intended for a 3 month old infant who's skull is still soft and forming. An 3 month infant is just leaving eye coordination and hand coordination and could seriously injury themselves or another infant during a play date. Play conscious when giving this toy to an 3 month infant.

customer_reviews.title: Baby’s favorite toy
customer_reviews.text: Our baby’s all time favorite toy when she was small. We had to have “happy puppy” everywhere we went. Definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT BABY TOY!!!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful toy. Couldnt be happier with it
customer_reviews.text: This cheap little toy is my boys favorite toy. He had to take it with him everywhere he went. It does have a tendency to go off on it's own if its bumped or anything. But that's why they love it
customer_reviews.author: LadyTaryn

customer_reviews.title: So entertaining!
customer_reviews.text: My baby LOVED this doggie! “Doggie” was one of her first words because she loved it so much. The ears make that wrinkly sound and she enjoyed biting them and turning the bangles on the handle. It rattles, sings and lights up too. She’s a toddler now and it’s still her favorite thing to hold. She wouldn’t go to bed without it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia K. Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Love that it’s easy to keep going
customer_reviews.text: Most toys you have to keep pressing the button to keep them going. This one you slightly wiggle and it keeps going with lots of different sounds, music and talking. Makes it easy to play. It’s super cute and my daughter loves it. The lights mesmerize her. Great toy for a new baby.
customer_reviews.author: LA Designer

customer_reviews.title: Baby Noah approved
customer_reviews.text: I love that it came with batteries and baby loves it. It doesn’t do much but it’s a great size toy to stuff in our baby bag. It catches our two month old son’s attention and I love that it’s easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Great little toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 4month old loves it. He gets excited looking at it. Whenever he is cranky or crying he smiles or laughs at it when wr play it

customer_reviews.title: 10 month old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Toy is cute, durable and keeps singing for a long time which is great since baby doesn't know to push buttons quite yet. Loves it!

customer_reviews.title: 3 month old loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute toy. It is a little annoying and repetitive. My son is three months old. He likes to watch it's cheeks light up. He likes the crinkely nose the ears make too. I would have given it a five star but the repetitiveness is driving me nuts!
customer_reviews.author: Shajj

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: It is just loud enough to entertain our 10 month old, but not so loud it drives the adults crazy. It can be turned on and off. It is durable and has many tactile options for them to explore.
customer_reviews.author: D V

product_meta.title: VTech Baby Rattle and Sing Puppy,Multicolor
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingVTech baby rattles are great baby toys and baby gifts. Shake to the music with the rattle and sing puppy by VTech! Your little one will love holding this easy-to-grasp rattle and shaking it to see the Puppy's cheeks light up and hear the colorful beads rattle. Press the music button to hear fun phrases, sounds and songs. The Puppy's colorful, crinkly ears also provide visual and tactile stimulation. The rattle has two textured rings that rattle and turn to build motor skills. Rattle and play with the interactive puppy! The baby rattle is intended for babies ages 3 months to 2 years. The toy rattle requires 3 LR44 batteries (batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use).
feature_bullets: Shake the easy-to-grasp rattle and sing puppy to hear the colorful beads rattle
Rattling The puppy also causes the puppy's cheeks to light up and introduces the concept of cause and effect
The music button plays fun phrases, sounds and songs; features 20+ songs, melodies, sounds and phrases
Colorful, crinkly ears provide visual and tactile stimulation; two textured rings rattle and turn to build motor skills
Requires 3 LR44 batteries (batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use); intended for ages 3 months to 2 years
